1395050.name: EX LIFE OST
1395050.description: The EX LIFE / EX WIFE soundtrack was produced in partnership with great artists from Brazil, such as Rogério Valente, Cookier Music and Yuri, member of the Triple Eleven team. Made entirely for the game, the songs are so engaging that you probably want to hear them more and more. Even on your cell phone when you're on your way to school, on your mp3 when you're on your lunch break, or at home, just to enjoy a cool hit.
